extendedInfo.description: Citizens Bank FREE Mobile Banking app allows you to check available balances and activity, pay bills, transfer funds, locate ATMs and Branches â all on your schedule, at your convenience. Citizens Bank Mobile Banking is available to all Citizens Bank Online Banking customers. Accessing the Citizens Bank Mobile Banking app is easy! Simply use the same username and password you have established for Citizens Bank Online Banking. FEATURES Access the bank accounts you manage at Citizens Bank Online View account balances See recent activity Pay bills Transfer money between accounts Track payments and deposits Receive account alerts SECURITY AND PRIVACY Our Citizens Bank Online Guarantee protects you from fraud with 100% Online and Mobile fraud protection. The technical security measures Citizens employs--including state-of-the-art encryption technology, firewalls and secure logon--protect your accounts from unauthorized users. Just like most major credit cards, you are protected 100% against unauthorized online and mobile transactions, visit www.citizensbank.com/security to learn more. We are committed to protecting the privacy of your financial information. See our online Privacy Policy on our web site at www.citizensbank.com/privacy CONTACT US Get help when you need it - Find ATMs and branches near your current location or search by city, state or zip code with our built in branch locator. Contact Customer Service 24/7 with our click to call right from your Android.

reviews.title: Needs more features
reviews.comment: Would be more useful if I could deposit checks through the app by taking a picture. Bank of America has this feature and it really comes in handy. I deposit checks frequently as my job doesn\'t do direct deposit. So it would be great to cut down on trips to the bank. Until then it\'s not that useful to me as I can see my transactions and upcoming bills with other apps like Check or Mint.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: How much longer will we be forced to wait for check picture deposit?!?!   Its been held out there as a carrot for quite some time. Once that is incorporated, 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: CBMB app
reviews.comment: It is a decent app but for me, The only way it would be better is to include the \"snapshot\" feature that so many others have. Then I could honestly give a five star rating. Until then, only three!
reviews.author: Geo Doughty

reviews.title: Deposit checks with camera?
reviews.comment: Where is the deposit check feature via smartphone camera? That\'s all it\'s missing from being a perfect banking app.
reviews.author: Rob Bermingham

reviews.title: Great when it\'s working
reviews.comment: I love the convenience of this app and how the money I transfer is immediately available. But twice in 24 hours it hasn\'t been able to log me into my account for different reasons.
reviews.author: Cecely Nutting

reviews.title: awesome app
reviews.comment: this app is wonderful. It lets me check my balance and do all my banking right on my phone it\'s so convenient I love it. No problems technically with my phone either.
reviews.author: Elizabeth Dornisch

reviews.title: Great app but...
reviews.comment: When I pay my bills,  it doesn\'t clear it from my pending bill page. Shows I still have to pay even thought I see it in the pending column.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: High Time to Add Check Deposition!
reviews.comment: It\'s high time to add check deposition by picture! Most respectable banks have already implemented this feature. Otherwise, good app.
reviews.author: Sergey Liberman

reviews.title: Needs more
reviews.comment: Still lacking the ability to deposit checks, which many mobile banking apps can do today, and I would find very useful. Interface looks dated but remains user friendly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Evo lte freshrom531
reviews.comment: Works fairly good, I wish it listed a running balance and didnt use (...) to list withdrawals. Make it the same as the web. When will we ever get deposits by picture as well.
reviews.author: Anthony Pallone

reviews.title: Unavailable
reviews.comment: Mobile banking is constantly \"unavailable\"  Like other people have said - Fix this. We know you can afford it with all the ridiculous fees you charge.
reviews.author: Roy Saunders

reviews.title: Old school droid bionic 4.1.2
reviews.comment: Good app, speed has also been greatly improved.  Still no snapshot deposit functionality.  +++Why cant I use special characters in my password, not much security in alpha/numerical characters only. +++ When added / corrected will give 5 stars.
reviews.author: JD Nelson

reviews.title: Ok app
reviews.comment: Not a bad app but \"service is unavailable\" too often. Also seems all the other banks enable you to take a picture of a check and deposit it. 5 stars if that gets added. May switch banks just to use that feature!
reviews.author: Ken Frenza

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Can\'t believe they still don\'t have photo deposit option.  Otherwise 5 stars.
reviews.author: Tim Murray

reviews.title: Ok for checking balances
reviews.comment: The message feature of the site and app need an enema.  The messages do not go any where but the site; no email, phone call or text messages   Everyone is waiting for the check deposit feature....other national banks figured it out...let\'s go.  All the money your saving by not paying interest on savings accounts or CDs could pay for the extra man power.
reviews.author: Michael Herbert

reviews.title: Easy to use, great app
reviews.comment: I like the easy access to my accounts: I can transfer money between my accounts, I can budget my funds more efficient. I like this app very much.
reviews.author: Sopheab Bo

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Love this app!  Very convenient and easy to check balances and transactions!
reviews.author: Janet Kolesar

reviews.title: Garbage!
reviews.comment: Looks like something from the 80\'s on my ipad...
reviews.author: Larry amati

reviews.title: Can\'t enter password
reviews.comment: Keyboard doesn\'t pop up for password input, therefore I can\'t login.. Also deposit check via camera would make this perfect
reviews.author: Pascal Carreau

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: \"Billpay not avail for smallbusiness\" even from my personal account. Not worth the time it took download.
reviews.author: Grace Chen
